overview: Freed after spending years in prison, an activist's homecoming turns into a dark affair as his disillusion clashes with his family's expectations. Demonstrating Chahine’s eclecticism, this is an elegant melodrama, exuberant musical, layered allegory, and profound portrait of personal and political disillusionment.

production_companies.name: Office National pour le Commerce et l'Industrie Cinématographique (ONCIC)

title: Return of the Prodigal Son
